intro: Echinodorus × barthii, commonly known as the Amazon Sword Plant, is a popular aquatic plant native to South America. It belongs to the Araceae family and is characterized by its broad, sword-like leaves that can grow up to 30 cm in length. The plant thrives in freshwater environments and is often cultivated in ponds and aquariums due to its ornamental value. It prefers moderate to high light conditions and can tolerate a range of water temperatures. Echinodorus × barthii is also known for its ability to improve water quality by absorbing nutrients and providing habitat for aquatic life.
